name: Sorbet Serenade
description:
Listen to the customer's order, then recreate it to the beat! Be ready, as the customers begin to order faster!

Use controls Z, X and C to play the game!
Z - Vanilla Sorbet and Sprinkles
X - Strawberry Sorbet  and Cherry
C - Chocolate Sorbet and Choco Sauce

Made in 2 days for the Playmakers Summertime Game Jam 2022!
All programming and sound done by Radsi (RadiantInferno)
All art assets drawn by the wonderful Clai!
